metadata.title: CVE-2022-3707 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A double-free memory flaw was found in the Linux kernel. The Intel GVT-ggraphics driver triggers VGA card system resource overload, causing a failin the intel_gvt_dma_map_guest_page function. This issue could allow alocal user to crash the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3707` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

No subscription required
